class django.db.utils.DatabaseErrorWrapper(wrapper)[source]

Context manager and decorator that reraises backend-specific database exceptions using Django’s common wrappers.

wrapper[source]
django.db.utils.load_backend(backend_name)[source]

Return a database backend’s “base” module given a fully qualified database backend name, or raise an error if it doesn’t exist.
